metadata.title: CVE-2022-1215 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A format string vulnerability was found in libinput

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1215` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libinput-bin - 1.20.0-1ubuntu0.1
libinput-tools - 1.20.0-1ubuntu0.1
libinput10 - 1.20.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libinput package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.20.0-1ubuntu0.1').
